amendment.description: Amendment to the Delahunt amendment (A002) sought to provide for a 99-year extension of the moratorium on state and local taxes on Internet access and commerce.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Delahunt amendment to provide for a 99-year extension of the moratorium on state and local taxes on the Internet.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Chabot to the Delahunt amendment (A002).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 90 - 336 (Roll no. 155).
